content.html:
In 2017, Team NAR built a new CMS and website for Nikkei Asia, launching them progressively in 2018 without any issues. Or so it seemed.

Join Alex in a whirlwind tour of how Team NAR mirrored content between two content-management-systems, what worked well (and what didn't) and the dangers of complicating technology solutions.

Originally presented at FT Engine Room 2021.
